tokenURI(address,uint256).details: This is a data URI with the JSON contents directly inlined.

params.sablier: The address of the Sablier contract the stream was created in.
params.streamId: The ID of the stream for which to produce a description.

returns.uri: The URI of the ERC721-compliant metadata.

tokenURI(address,uint256).notice: Produces the URI describing a particular stream NFT.
